artifacts.summary: Alternative approaches and prior art analysis for modal saturation construction
Primary research: S5 axiom-5 based BoxContent invariance resolves all 3 sorries in Zorn saturation proof
Two-tier vs single-pass construction analysis - recommends unified Zorn approach over two-tier

summary: Two-tier construction is NOT required and prior attempts failed due to GContent/BoxContent incompatibility. The mathematically elegant solution is a unified single-pass Zorn construction that builds temporal coherence AND modal saturation simultaneously, enabled by S5 BoxContent invariance. RecursiveSeed already demonstrates unified Diamond/temporal witness handling.
